name: 闇行者 Dark Heroic
description:
Dark Heroic is an Action Role-Playing Game.
Need fewer buttons and easy to operate. Excessive reaction speed is not required during combat, but it is a test of the observation of enemy actions.
The difficulty is arranged in a step-by-step manner, but the overall difficulty is high, suitable for players who love the challenge.
The character switches with the progress of the plot to understand the perspectives of all parties. However, the plot will be as short and bright as possible, so that the whole will pay more attention to the battle.

Story Introduction
People with the power of "Elements" are called "Heroic", and their power is divided into seven kinds, Metal, Water, Wood, Fire, Earth, Light, and Dark.
Among them, light and dark are the most rare, and only one person has it.
At the beginning of the founding of the country, the Heroics had great credit, but they did not receive the treatment they deserved.
The small farce in the market eventually became the fuse, and the seven most powerful people of founding father, disunited individuals...

Game Control
Move [ ↑ ] [ ↓ ] [ ← ] [ → ]
Attack [ Z ] [ X ] [ C ]
Setting [ S ]

※ The game is still in the development stage, the official version will provide more levels and better translation.
